Uses of Class
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container.InterceptorComponent

  • Packages that use InterceptorComponent 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container
    Contains the interceptors used by the web containers.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde
    Provides the ability to running a WComponent application in a Servlet container directly from any development environment.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet
    Provides support for running a WComponent application in a Servlet container.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium
    Provides a WComponent UI testing API using the Selenium 2.0 WebDriver framework.

    • Uses of InterceptorComponent in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container

      Subclasses of InterceptorComponent in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AjaxDebugStructureInterceptor
      An Interceptor used to output structural debugging information for AJAX requests.
      class  AjaxErrorInterceptor
      This interceptor catches exceptions and sets them as an error code.
      class  AjaxInterceptor
      This InterceptorComponent looks for an ajax 'trigger' parameter in the request.
      class  AjaxPageShellInterceptor
      This InterceptorComponent provides the XML wrapper necessary for serving up an AJAX response.
      class  AjaxSetupInterceptor
      This interceptor setups the AJAX operation details.
      class  ContextCleanupInterceptor
      This interceptor removes component model objects that are no longer needed from the UIContext.
      class  DataListInterceptor
      This interceptor is used to render data lists back to the client.
      class  DebugStructureInterceptor
      An Interceptor used to output structural debugging information.
      class  FormInterceptor
      This interceptor is used as the top-level component in both Portlet and Servlet environments.
      class  HeadLineInterceptor
      Adds headline entries to a page.
      class  PageShellInterceptor
      HtmlComponent adds in some HTTP headers and elements commonly used in HTML-based web apps.
      class  ResponseCacheInterceptor
      Interceptor that sets the appropriate response headers for caching or not caching the response.
      class  SessionTokenAjaxInterceptor
      This session token interceptor makes sure the ajax request being processed is for the correct session.
      class  SessionTokenContentInterceptor
      This session token interceptor makes sure the content request being processed is for the correct session.
      class  SessionTokenInterceptor
      This session token interceptor makes sure the request being processed is for the correct session.
      class  SubordinateControlInterceptor
      This InterceptorComponent will process any subordinate controls that were registered as being active on the client (i.e. rendered).
      class  TargetableErrorInterceptor
      This interceptor catches exceptions and sets them as an error code.
      class  TargetableInterceptor
      This interceptor component checks to see if a parameter named Environment.TARGET_ID exists on the request.
      class  TransformXMLInterceptor
      This interceptor is used to perform server-side XSLT so that HTML is delivered to the client instead of XML.
      class  UIContextDumpInterceptor
      SessionDumpInterceptor is an interceptor that dumps the contents of the session to the log file.
      class  ValidateXMLInterceptor
      An Interceptor used to report any WComponent that has generated HTML/XML that is not well formed.
      class  VelocityInterceptor
      This component is for rendering only, and contains no behaviour.
      class  WhitespaceFilterInterceptor
      WhitespaceFilterInterceptor is an interceptor that removes HTML comments and redundant white space from HTML output.
      class  WrongStepAjaxInterceptor
      This wrong step interceptor makes sure that ajax requests are only processed for the most recently rendered view.
      class  WrongStepContentInterceptor
      This wrong step interceptor makes sure that content requests are only processed from the most recently rendered view.
      class  WrongStepServerInterceptor
      This wrong step interceptor prevents an old request being processed that might have been submitted by a user using multiple windows.
      class  WWindowInterceptor
      This interceptor temporarily replaces the primary UIContext's Environment with an Environment suitable for processing a content request for a WWindow.

      The interceptor component returned here is used to wrap the html fragment generated by the UI component.
